Package ie.mtu.application.student.controller

Class SettingController

java.lang.Object
ie.mtu.application.student.controller.SettingController
public class SettingController
extends java.lang.Object
This class from is the main controller in the MVC application. The methods will be called by the View package and this class will just control the parameters from the view and give them to the Model

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SettingController​(University university)
    Set up the controller by adding the University instance

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addObserver​(Observer observer)

    It will delete a student from the database

    It will call the model to get the list of all modules from a student

    • SettingController

      public SettingController​(University university)
      Set up the controller by adding the University instance
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • setUpView

      public void setUpView​(MainGUI view)
      This function will instantiate the instance variables of the different View classes from the View package
      Parameters:
      view - the main class of the View package

    • insertStudent

      public void insertStudent​(javafx.scene.control.TextField txtFirstname, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtLastname, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtID, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker txtDateBirth)
      The method will create a Student object from the given parameters Then it will call the model to insert the Student object in the database And it will display a message It will also check if the given parameters are correct
      Parameters:
      txtFirstname - : the firstame of the student from the textfield (will be cast into a string)
      txtLastname - : the lastname of the student from the textfield (will be cast into a string)
      txtID - : the id of the student from the textfield (will be cast into an integer)
      txtDateBirth - : the date of birth of the student from the textfield (will be cast into a Date object)

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Student> tableView)
      It will delete a student from the database
      Parameters:
      tableView - : the TableView from the GUI

    • updateStudent

      public void updateStudent​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Student> tableView, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtFirstname, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtLastname, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtID, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker txtDateBirth)
      Function that will update an existing Student
      Parameters:
      tableView - : the TableView that contains all student from the database
      txtFirstname - : the Textfield that contains the fistname of the student
      txtLastname - : the Textfield that contains the lastname of the student
      txtID - : the Textfield that contains the ID of the student
      txtDateBirth - : the DatePicker that contains the date of birth of the student

    • getStudentList

      public java.util.List<Student> getStudentList()
      Returns:
      return from the model a list of all students

    • insertModule

      public void insertModule​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Student> cboStudent, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtGrade, javafx.scene.control.TextField txtModuleName, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Module> tableView)
      The method will insert a new module from a specific student
      Parameters:
      cboStudent - : the Combobox of type Student that the user selected
      txtGrade - : the Textfield that contains the grade
      txtModuleName - : the Textfield that contains the module name
      tableView - : the TableView that contains all the modules from the student selected

    • deleteModule

      public void deleteModule​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Student> cboStudent, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Module> moduleTableView)
      It will delete a module from a specific student
      Parameters:
      cboStudent - : the ComboBox of type Student that the user selected
      moduleTableView - : the TableView that the user clicked on one of the modules of the specific student

    • getModuleList

      public java.util.List<Module> getModuleList​(int studentID)
      It will call the model to get the list of all modules from a student
      Parameters:
      studentID - : the student ID that we want to get his modules
      Returns:
      a List of Module

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver​(Observer observer)
      The method will call the model to make him add a class that implemented the Observer interface
      Parameters:
      observer - : the class that implemented the Observer interface
